content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you looking for help with electrical, plumbing, or HVAC needs?
Hi, I actually had considered some electrical work, but I think I’m going to pass.
No problem at all. If you don’t mind me asking, is there a specific reason you’ve decided not to move forward? If there’s anything I can help with or any questions you have, please let me know.
Honestly, I’m moving in a few weeks. Doesn’t make sense to fix up the place right now. Thanks, but I’m not interested.
Thank you for letting me know. Best of luck with your move! If you ever need help in the future, please feel free to contact us again. Have a great day!
reason: Customer moving soon and does not want to invest in repairs.
